Contributions

I am a dedicated full-stack developer currently serving as the Webmaster at the Alabama Community College System. With a passion for tackling challenging coding problems head-on, I have honed my expertise in custom WordPress development, ensuring seamless user experiences and robust backend functionality. My skills span a wide range, from PHP, React, JavaScript, HTML, to CSS, allowing me to craft dynamic and innovative web solutions. Beyond the digital realm, I am an avid learner who thrives on expanding my knowledge, and I find solace and inspiration in the beauty of nature, which fuels my creativity and determination.

My journey in web development has been an exciting one, marked by a commitment to continuous learning and problem-solving. As a full-stack developer, I have had the privilege of creating and optimizing web solutions that drive innovation and user engagement. Whether it is constructing intricate WordPress themes or diving into the intricacies of PHP and React, I revel in the challenge of building seamless digital experiences that make an impact.

When I am not immersed in the world of code, I am often found exploring the natural wonders of Alabama and beyond. My love for nature is not just a hobby but a wellspring of inspiration that enhances my creative thinking and problem-solving abilities. It is a reminder that the best solutions often echo the elegant simplicity of the natural world, and I bring this perspective to my work as a full-stack developer, striving to create web solutions that are both beautiful and functional.

EXPERIENCE
2018 - Present
Alabama Community College System
Webmaster

Responsible for creating new websites, promotional emails, website maintenance, helping maintain company standards for design, performing navigation and browser compatibility tests, performing quality control for internal and external content maintaining databases, ensuring responsive web design for mobile devices, maintaining integration with third-party applications, troubleshooting website errors, rebooting servers, and maintenance of key web applications.

2012 - Present
Café Racer Magazine & Ton-Up TV
Web Content Manager

Overhauled previous e-commerce website, increasing future sales. Café Racer is a rapidly growing magazine providing a complete, bimonthly guide to café racers. Implemented a digital magazine and Café Racer TV streaming subscription for purchase. Team up with the sales representative to create additional ad revenue.

2010 - 2018
Hatton-Brown Publishers, Inc.
Web Developer

Served as the web developer for Hatton-Brown, a production company that has grown to be the influential leader in forest-based publishing for over 60 years. Managed the website division for over 15 different magazines and expositions. Sole creator and organizer of HB Media, a web development service offered to small business owners.

2007 - 2010
Hatton-Brown Publishers, Inc.
Graphic Designer

Worked with a team of designers to produce seven magazines to meet the print deadline. Designed layouts, color-corrected pictures for all publications. Updated websites and managed social media accounts for all publications and expositions.
